import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem } from 'reactstrap'; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; import firebase from '../config'; import Doc from './DocService'; import PdfContainer from './PdfContainer'; class ViewInvoice extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { invoiceList: {}, shipping: {}, cartDataItems: [], date: new Date().toLocaleString() } } componentDidMount() { const {orderID} = this.props.match.params; console.log(orderID); let thiss = this; var ref = firebase .database() .ref(`orders/${orderID}`); ref.on('value', function (childSnapShot) { console.log(childSnapShot); const orders = { orderId: orderID, cartDataItems: childSnapShot .val() .cartDataItems, invoiceId: childSnapShot .val() .orderId, customerName: childSnapShot .val() .name, items: childSnapShot .val() .items, shipping: childSnapShot .val() .shipping, status: childSnapShot .val() .status, subTotal: childSnapShot .val() .subTotal, totalDiscount: childSnapShot .val() .totalDiscount, totalGST: childSnapShot .val() .totalGST, totalAmount: childSnapShot .val() .totalAmount, GrandTotal: parseFloat(childSnapShot.val().totalAmount) + parseFloat(childSnapShot.val().totalDiscount) + parseFloat(childSnapShot.val().totalGST), created_on: childSnapShot .val() .created_on }; thiss.setState({ invoiceList: orders, shipping: childSnapShot .val() .shipping, cartDataItems: childSnapShot .val() .cartDataItems }, () => { console.log(thiss.state.invoiceList, 'viewInvoice'); }); }); } createPdf = (html) => Doc.createPdf(html,avinash); render() { let totalcart = 0; let PackingCost = 0; var packingCostVal = 0; return (

Invoice

Users User Invoice

Invoice

Order ID : {this.state.invoiceList.invoiceId}
Shipping Address

{this.state.shipping.name}

{this.state.shipping.address}

{this.state.shipping.cityName}, {this.state.shipping.stateName}

{this.state.shipping.pincode}, {this.state.shipping.countryName}

Landmark :{this.state.shipping.landMark}
{this.state.cartDataItems && this .state .cartDataItems .map((data, index) => { var gstCaluculate = (data.sellingPrice * data.gstValue / 100).toFixed(2); var totalGSTVal = ((data.quantity) * (data.sellingPrice)) + ((data.quantity) * gstCaluculate); packingCostVal = data.quantity * data.packagingCost; console.log(totalGSTVal); totalcart += (totalGSTVal); PackingCost += packingCostVal; return ( ) })}
S.No Image Name Unit Price Quantity GST Dispache Date Sub Total
{index + 1} {data.productName} {data.sellingPrice} {data.quantity} {parseFloat((data.quantity) * gstCaluculate).toFixed(2)} ({(data.gstValue)}%) {data.created_on} {parseFloat(((data.quantity) * (data.sellingPrice)) + ((data.quantity) * gstCaluculate)).toFixed(2)}

Subtotal: Rs.{parseFloat(totalcart).toFixed(2)}

Shipping charges: Rs.{parseInt(PackingCost).toFixed(2)}

Order Total: Rs.{(totalcart + parseInt(PackingCost)).toFixed(2)}

Gootes Essen India Pvt Ltd
Address: 17, 7th a cross, ganesh nagar layout,
virupakshapura,Bangalore, Karnataka
India 560097
Email: support@gootes.com
Monday - Friday: 9:30 a.m. - 6:30 p.m.
); } } export default ViewInvoice;
